link:labelLink.link:label: Represents information pertaining to address one of audit firm.
Represents information pertaining to address three of audit firm.
Represents information pertaining to address two of audit firm.
Represents information pertaining to the application of submission on the filing.
Represents information pertaining to the type of private company covered under audit exemption.
Represents information pertaining to basis of accounting standards applied to prepare the financial statements.
Represents information pertaining to company's current financial year end date.
Represents information pertaining to company's current financial year start date.
Represents information pertaining to company's previous financial year end date.
Represents information pertaining to company's previous financial year start date.

Represents information pertaining to company registered number. Company registration number pattern should be maximum 7 digits plus 1 alphabet{[0-9],[0-9],[0-9],[0-9],[0-9],[0-9],[0-9],[A-Z]} example : [5050505X]
Represents information pertaining to SSM practicing certificate of secretary registered number that consists of a 12 digit number, example : 201908001956
Represents information pertaining to court order reference number
Represents information pertaining to the date on which the financial statements and reports are circulated to members.
Represents information pertaining to date on which company is certified as exempt private company.
Represents information pertaining to date of tabling financial statements and reports of the directors and auditors in the annual general meeting.
Represents information pertaining to date on which the financial statements has been approved by the Board of Directors.
Represents information pertaining to date on which auditor's report is signed.
Represents information pertaining to date on which Statement by Directors is signed.
Represents information pertaining to date of which the Statutory Declaration prepared together with the financial statements and reports for the purposes of Companies Act 2016.
Represents information pertaining description of business during the financial year.

Represents information pertaining to description of functional currency which is used for statistical purposes as to identify the company's functional currency used in it's major business transactions.
Represents information pertaining to description of presentation currency. Financial statements will have MYR as mandatory presentation of currency in Malaysia.

Represents information pertaining to description on whether company had applied any exemption, waiver, relief or extension of time with regards to annual return or financial statements and reports to Minister.

Represents information pertaining to description on whether company had applied for any exemption, waiver, relief or extension of time with regards to annual return or financial statements and reports from Registrar or Minister.
Represents information pertaining to description on whether company had applied for exemption from coinciding foreign subsidiary financial year end with holding company.
Represents information pertaining to description on whether company had applied for extension of time for circulation of financial statements and reports.
Represents information pertaining to description on whether company had applied for extension of time for circulation and holding annual general meeting.
Represents information pertaining to description on whether company had applied for extension of time to lodge annual return.
Represents information pertaining to description on whether company had applied for extension of time to lodge financial statements and reports.
Represents information pertaining to description on whether company had applied for relief from requirements as to form and contents of Director's report.
Represents information pertaining to description on whether company had applied for relief from requirements as to form and contents of financial statements.
Represents information pertaining to description on whether company had applied for exemption from filing financial statements and reports in full XBRL format.
Represents information pertaining to description on whether company had applied to waive lodgement of financial statements by foreign company.
Represents information pertaining to disclosure of auditor's statement.
Represents information pertaining to the audit status of financial statements of the company.
Represents information pertaining to whether company is preparing financial statements for first time since incorporation or subsequent submission
Represents information pertaining to other accounting standards applied to prepare the financial statements.
Represents information pertaining to disclosure of regulation applied during incorporation of the company.
Represents information pertaining to disclosure of the status as an exempt private company.
Represents information pertaining to disclosure of whether company is regulated by Bank Negara Malaysia at the financial year end.
Represents information pertaining to disclosure on type of guarantee provided by director.
Represents information pertaining to disclosure on whether any director provided guarantee to give financial support if the company insolvent.

Represents information pertaining to disclosure on whether as at the date to which the financial statement has been made up, the company appeared to have been able to meet its liabilities as and when the liabilities fall due.
Represents information pertaining to disclosure on whether company changed the duration of financial reporting period.
Represents information pertaining to disclosure on whether company has kept proper accounting reports and other books during the financial period.
Represents information pertaining involvement as management company under Interest Scheme.
Represents information pertaining to disclosure on whether company is and has at all relevant time been an exempted private company.
Represents information pertaining to whether company's shares are traded on any official stock exchange during the financial year.
Represents information pertaining to disclosure on whether comparative period values are restated.
Represents information pertaining to disclosure whether a duly audited financial statements reports required under Companies Act 2016 has been circulate to its members.
Represents information pertaining to disclosure on whether opening statements changed due to changes in accounting standards.
Represents information pertaining to disclosure on whether reclassification of previous financial statements changed due to changes in accounting standards.
Represents information pertaining to last former name of the company.
Represents information pertaining to identification number of director who is responsible for signing the return of exempt private company.
Represents information pertaining to identification number of fifth director who signed Statement by Directors.
Represents information pertaining to identification number of first director who signed Statement by Directors.
Represents information pertaining to identification number of fourth director who signed Statement by Directors.
Represents information pertaining to identification number of second director who signed Statement by Directors.
Represents information pertaining to identification number of third director who signed Statement by Directors.
Represents information pertaining to identification number of company secretary who is responsible for signing the return of exempt private company.
Represents information pertaining to level of rounding used in financial statements.
Represents information pertaining to license number of auditor as at the reporting date.
Represents information pertaining to method used for preparing statement of cash flows.
Represents information pertaining to method used for preparing statement of comprehensive income.
Represents information pertaining to method used for preparing statement of financial position.
Represents information pertaining to method used for preparing statement of profit or loss.
Represents information pertaining to method used for preparing changes in an entity's equity.
Represents information pertaining MSIC code.
Represents information pertaining to the name and version of software used to generate XBRL file
Represents information pertaining to name of audit firm.
Represents information pertaining to name of auditor signing the auditor's report.
Represents information pertaining to name of company secretary responsible for signing the return of exempt private company.
Represents information pertaining to name of directors responsible for signing the return of exempt private company.
Represents information pertaining to name of fifth director who signed Statement by Directors.
Represents information pertaining to name of first director who signed Statement by Directors.
Represents information pertaining to name of fourth director who signed Statement by Directors.
Represents information pertaining to current company's name.
Represents information pertaining to name of second director who signed Statement by Directors.
Represents information pertaining to name of auditor responsible for signing the return of exempt private company.
Represents information pertaining to name of third director who signed Statement by Directors.
Represents information pertaining to nature of financial statements.
Represents information pertaining to company registered number. The new company registration number format consists of a 12 digit number, example : 201901000005
Represents information pertaining to number of directors signing Statement by Directors.
Represents information pertaining origin of the company whether incorporated in Malaysia or incorporated outside Malaysia.
Represents information pertaining to postcode where audit firm is located.
Represents information pertaining to registration number of audit firm.
Represents information pertaining to state where audit firm is located.
Represents information pertaining to status of carrying on business during the financial year.
Represents information pertaining to status of company as at the financial year end.
Represents information pertaining to the date of statutory declaration for rectification
Represents information pertaining to town where audit firm is located.
Represents information pertaining to type of auditor's opinion.
Represents information pertaining to the type of company as at the financial year end.
Represents information pertaining to type of identification of second director who signed Statement by Directors.
Represents information pertaining to type of identification of company secretary who is responsible for signing the return of exempt private company.
Represents information pertaining to type of identification of director who is responsible for signing the return of exempt private company.
Represents information pertaining to type of identification of fifth director who signed Statement by Directors.
Represents information pertaining to type of identification of first director who signed Statement by Directors.
Represents information pertaining to type of identification of fourth director who signed Statement by Directors.
Represents information pertaining to type of identification of third director who signed Statement by Directors.
Represents information pertaining to type of submission for preparing financial statements.
